prompt_question: Tell me about a time when you had to debug a difficult problem.
candidate_answer_text: During my internship we had a bug where the API was returning 500 errors for certain users. I used the logs to isolate the patternâ€”it only happened with users who had special characters in their profile. I traced it to an unescaped query parameter and fixed it with a proper encoding function. I also added a unit test so it wouldn't happen again.
